Title: Requires consideration of union made commodities and services in the awarding of certain procurement contracts
Summary: Requires consideration as a quantitative factor whether the commodities or services were manufactured or will be performed by a labor union with respect to the awarding of certain procurement contracts.
LawCode: Amd ยง163, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to requiring consideration of union made commodities and services in the awarding of certain procurement contracts
